Flow Chart

1. Import the data
2. Preprocessing
    1. Create Features
    2. Add Class Names
    3. Add Median Reflectance Values
    4. Combine Feature Observations
    5. Write out CSV
3. Machine learning methods
    1. K-Nearest Neighbors
    2. Random Forest
    3. Support Vector Machine
    4. Gaussian NB
    5. Gaussian Process Classifier
    6. Gradient Boosting
    7. ADA Boost Classifier
    8. Voting Classifier
4. Machine Learning
    1. VoxNet
    2. Point Net ++
